title: opt out
extract: Or you can go online and opt in to the system and create any restrictions you want on your record. If you want to opt out, there are three ways to do this. Online: Go to www.myhealthrecord.gov.au. Phone: Call 1800 723 471. Mail: Complete a paper form and return it by mail.Dec 6, 2018
extract_html: Or you can go online and opt in to the system and create any restrictions you want on your record. If you want to opt out, there are three ways to do this. Online: Go to www.myhealthrecord.gov.au. Phone: Call 1800 723 471. Mail: Complete a paper form and return it by mail.Dec 6, 2018
